shortcv.p: Dimitris Drossos holds a Bachelor Degree in Computer Science from the University of Crete and an MSc with Distinction in E-commerce from the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB). Currently, he is a PhD student in the Department of Management Science and Technology at AUEB. Mobile marketing and advertising effectiveness are his central points of research and other interests focus on m-commerce technologies and services. He is also Research Officer in ELTRUN/WRC, where he is involved in several European and National research projects. In the past he worked in several companies with diverse research domains including Hellenic National Meteorological Service, University of Crete net (UCnet), IP Datacom & Services Ericsson Stockholm, Atlantis Group Univ. of Crete, and Foundation for Research and Technology - Hellas (ICS-FORTH).
